verses.text: Now it came to pass in the \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, as I \add was\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w captives|strong="H1473"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*, \add that\add* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* were \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, and I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w visions|strong="H4759"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft captives: Heb. captivity\f*

In the \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which \add was\add* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoiachin’s|strong="H3112"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w*,

The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* came expressly unto \w Ezekiel|strong="H3168"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Buzi|strong="H0941"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Chebar|strong="H3529"\w*; and the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was there upon him.  +  r 1.3  t Ezekiel: Heb. Jehezkel *

¶ And I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, a \w whirlwind|strong="H7307"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w infolding|strong="H3947"\w* itself, and a \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \add was\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it, and out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof as the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of \w amber|strong="H2830"\w*, out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft infolding…: Heb. catching itself\f*

Also out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof \add came\add* the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of \w four|strong="H0702"\w* living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w*. And this \add was\add* their \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w*; \w they|strong="H2007"\w* had the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.
And every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0259"\w* had \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

And their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \add were\add* \w straight|strong="H3477"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; and the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \add was\add* like the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of a \w calf’s|strong="H5695"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*: and they \w sparkled|strong="H5340"\w* like the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of \w burnished|strong="H7044"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft straight…: Heb. a straight foot\f*

And \add they had\add* the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* under their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* on their \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sides|strong="H7253"\w*; and they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* and their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

Their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \add were\add* \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* \w one|strong="H0802"\w* to \w another|strong="H0269"\w*; they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not when they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*; they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w straight|strong="H5676"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*.

As for the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, on the right \w side|strong="H3225"\w*: and they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* on the left \w side|strong="H8040"\w*; they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* also had the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*.

Thus \add were\add* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: and their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \add were\add* \w stretched|strong="H6504"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add wings\add* of every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add were\add* \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* their \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w*.\f + \fr 1.11 \ft stretched…: or, divided above\f*

And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w straight|strong="H5676"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*: whither the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*; \add and\add* they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not when they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*.

As for the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w*, their \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \add was\add* like \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add and\add* like the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w lamps|strong="H3940"\w*: it went up and \w down|strong="H1980"\w* among the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w*; and the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* was \w bright|strong="H5051"\w*, and out of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*.
And the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* \w ran|strong="H7519"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of a flash of \w lightning|strong="H0965"\w*.

¶ Now as I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w*, behold \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w*, with his \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*.

The \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* and their \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \add was\add* like unto the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of a \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*: and they \w four|strong="H0702"\w* had \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w*: and their \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* and their \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \add was\add* as it were a \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* in the \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w*.

When they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* upon their \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sides|strong="H7253"\w*: \add and\add* they \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* not when they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*.

As for their \w rings|strong="H1354"\w*, they were so \w high|strong="H1363"\w* that they were \w dreadful|strong="H3374"\w*; and their \w rings|strong="H1354"\w* \add were\add* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them \w four|strong="H0702"\w*.\f + \fr 1.18 \ft and their rings: or, and their strakes\f*

And when the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* by \w them|strong="H0681"\w*: and when the living \w creatures|strong="H2416"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*.

Whithersoever the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, thither \add was their\add* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*; and the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* them: for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \add was\add* in the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*.\f + \fr 1.20 \ft of…: or, of life\f*

When those \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, \add these\add* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*; and when those \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \add these\add* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*; and when those were lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* were lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* them: for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \add was\add* in the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w*.\f + \fr 1.21 \ft of…: or, of life\f*

And the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* upon the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the living \w creature|strong="H2416"\w* \add was\add* as the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* \w crystal|strong="H7140"\w*, stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* over their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

And under the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* \add were\add* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w straight|strong="H3477"\w*, the \w one|strong="H0802"\w* toward the \w other|strong="H0269"\w*: every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w*, which \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* on this \w side|strong="H2007"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w*, which \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* on that \w side|strong="H2007"\w*, their \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w*.

And when they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, like the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, as the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w speech|strong="H1999"\w*, as the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of an \w host|strong="H4264"\w*: when they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, they let \w down|strong="H7503"\w* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

And there was a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* that \add was\add* over their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, when they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \add and\add* had let \w down|strong="H7503"\w* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.

¶ And \w above|strong="H4605"\w* the \w firmament|strong="H7549"\w* that \add was\add* over their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \add was\add* the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of a \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of a \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: and upon the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \add was\add* the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* upon it.

And I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* as the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of \w amber|strong="H2830"\w*, as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* it, from the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* even \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, and from the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* even \w downward|strong="H4295"\w*, I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* as it were the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and it had \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

As the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* that is in the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, so \add was\add* the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*. This \add was\add* the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* of the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And when I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, I \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of one that \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*.
